name: granny all the way stocking
notes:

get the yarn at wecrochet:
click here for yarn: [brava tweed worsted][6]**

the **granny all the way stocking collection** crochet pattern set features 7 unique granny stitch stockings, each with its own delightful colorwork design! these fun and festive stockings are perfect for adding a cozy, handmade touch to your holiday decorations. whether you hang them by the fireplace or use them as cheerful accents around the house, they’ll bring joy for years to come. with their timeless charm, these stockings are sure to become a treasured part of your holiday traditions!

perfect for crocheters of all levels, this stocking pattern collection comes with detailed instructions, including a full video tutorial. construction is easy-peasy - we’ll start by making a toe, then work the body in your chosen colorwork design leaving a heel opening. then, we’ll add a ribbed top to the stocking, and finish by adding a heel. feel free to add a hanging tag, bells, tassels, or any other embellishments!
 
crochet hook:
[h (5.0mm) - or size to meet gauge][1]

notions:
[removable stitch marker][2]
[yarn needle to weave in ends][3]
[scissors][4]
[clover tassel maker][5]

yarn:
[brava tweed worsted][6]
97% premium acrylic, 3% viscose; 218yds/100g
colorways shown: wren, wasabi, mink, and boysenberry

yardage:
approximately 265 total yards per stocking. see table on page 4 of pattern for variation in exact yardage per color.

yarn substitutions:

[brava worsted][7]
100 % premium acrylic; 218yds/100g

[mighty stitch][8]
80% acrylic, 20% superwash wool; 208yds/100g

[mary maxim starlette worsted][9]
100% ultra soft acrylic; 180yds/100g 

abbreviations
blo - back loop only
ch - chain
dc - double crochet
rs - right side
sl st - slip stitch
sc - single crochet
st(s) - stitch(es)
[stsc - stacked single crochet][10]
ws - wrong side

gauge:
15 sts x 9 rows = 4”x4” in granny stitch with 5.0mm hook


not sure what gauge is? check out this blog post: [what is crochet gauge and how to fix it][11]

one size:
stocking is roughly 17.5” long, 6.5” wide

skill level:
advanced beginner
